Contact

You can contact me or find me online from the below

  • Email: rw@robwatts.org
  • LinkedIn
  • GitHub

I still have a Twitter account, but I try not to doom scroll in it very much. I'm generally not a fan of social media platforms like Twitter, Insta, FB etc so if you find an account of mine I haven't got round to deleting please don't be surprised to receive no reply.

I wrote a note about this in my review of the very excellent [[10 Arguments For Deleting Your Social Media Accounts Right Now (Jaron Lanier)]].
